movie.title: Sucker Punch
movie.writer: Zack Snyder (screenplay), Steve Shibuya (screenplay), Zack Snyder (story)
movie.actors: Emily Browning, Abbie Cornish, Jena Malone, Vanessa Hudgens
movie.plot: A young girl is institutionalized by her abusive stepfather, retreating to an alternative reality as a coping strategy, envisioning a plan to help her escape.
